resources.string: Hello World, info!
SGS Tools
Choose default homescreen
Choose the amount of screens
Execute the command(s) as su
The command(s) to execute. Put each command in a new line.
The name of the shortcut.
No name specified for the shortcut!
No commands specified!
Long press for basic commands (shutdown, mount, etc)!
Enter the name.
Choose the icon for the shortcut. Place custom Icons to /sdcard/sgstools.
Menu
With proceeding the device will be reset to factory settings! This cannot be undone!
With proceeding all personal Data and Settings will be deleted!
Attention!
Delete selected
You can restore the stock sounds after setting a custom or no bootsound.\nPut custom boot sounds to /sdcard/sgstools
Set your preferred boot sound here. Boot sounds must be in the .wav format.
Set your preferred shutdown sound here. Shutdown sounds must exists as .ogg
Delete all selected system apps?\nThis can be undone (if you are experienced), but for example a hardreset won\'t help. The .apk and the .odex can be backuped in /sdcard/sgstools/\n
The app does not check the current boot sound, so on every start it first says standard!
